definitions.definition: A regularly-shaped slab of clay or other material, affixed to cover or decorate a surface, as in a roof -tile, glazed tile, stove tile, carpet tile , etc.

examples: Each tile within the map consists of 256 × 256 pixels.
Sprites and tiles that are hidden in the prototype ROM file can be recovered.

definitions.definition: Any of various flat cuboid playing pieces used in certain games, such as dominoes , Scrabble , or mahjong .
A Lego piece that is 1/3 the height of a brick, and is smooth without studs on top.

main_definition: A regularly-shaped slab of clay or other material, affixed to cover or decorate a surface, as in a roof -tile, glazed tile, stove tile, carpet tile , etc.
secondary_definitions: Any of various flat cuboid playing pieces used in certain games, such as dominoes , Scrabble , or mahjong .
(Lego building) A Lego piece that is 1/3 the height of a brick, and is smooth without studs on top.
